actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to permit secondary mortgage financing for residential properties that include small day care centers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Small Day Care Center Assistance Act

summary.text: Small Day Care Center Assistance Act - Amends the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Act to define the term "mortgage" to include a mortgage secured by a one-to-four family residential property that is occupied as a residence and in which child care service is legally provided.

titles.title: Small Day Care Center Assistance Act
A bill to permit secondary mortgage financing for residential properties that include small day care centers, and for other purposes.
